original_title: On Trial 3: Taking It To The Jury
overview: The case that was presented in Parts 1 and 2 is now in the hands of the jury. As they deliberate on the merits of each scene and try to determine if its contents are obscene, the jurors' points are illustrated by fantasy sequences (involving themselves), and flashbacks from the movie.
title: On Trial 3: Taking It To The Jury
